A4.text: the film is about two musicians (Curtis and Lemmon) who disguise themselves as women to escape Chicago mobsters they witnessed commit murder

A5.text: Joe and Jerry disguise themselves as women named Josephine and Daphne so they can join Sweet Sue and her Society Syncopators, an all-female band headed to Miami by train

A6.text: Daytime temperatures exceed 90°F (32°C) on average of 17 days each summer.
